metadata.title: CVE-2024-25191 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: php-jwt 1.0.0 uses strcmp (which is not constant time) to verifyauthentication, which makes it easier to bypass authentication via a timingside channel.

criterions.comment: php-jwt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
